name: Don't Crash - The Zombie Game
description:
WARNING THIS GAME CRASHES WHEN YOU DIE! IT'S THE POINT OF THE GAME!
THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS GAME! The current state is a test beta. The full game will be finished by Summer 2021.


Welcome to the second installment of the "Don't Crash" game series!
Game features "endless" Zombie and Soldier combat, 3 levels with varying difficulties
As well as shotgun, pistols, assault rifles, and knives.

Key Features:
1. Game Crashes When You Die
2. Zombie and Soldier AI With Cover and Footstep Listening
3. First Person Shooting
4. Several Weapons
5. Several Levels
6. Score System
7. Updates With New Content
8. Consistent Bug Patches
